name: The Enchanter's Daughter
description:
The Enchanter's Daughter


Once upon a time there lived a girl in a castle far away wondering where she was from.

Her father a powerful wizard never let her know of her past. One day she stumbles

upon a secret hidden far away.

Age Rating: Kid, Animated Violence

Controls:

WASD and Arrowkeys

C – Read, Confirm

X – Use equipped item


A game by:

Tito B – Programming and other pixelart – @teapomana

Hannah Geene – Character Design, Tilemaps – @lemongreen452

Brandon Harrold - Music – https://bhmediacompositions.wordpress.com/

The original book which this game was inspired can also be purchased through here.
